title: Design and Application of Mobile Crowdsensing Incentive Mechanisms

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental concepts in mobile computing and data collection, with intermediate-level statistical analysis skills
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, emphasizing practical application case-centered education

learning_goals: The core principles of online incentive mechanisms (quality assessment, user selection, payment decisions) can be explained.
An incentive model applicable to dynamic user environments can be designed under limited budgets.
Evaluation protocols addressing adverse selection and moral hazard issues can be implemented.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
